text: @SenSchumer Mr Schumer, you’ve been around for ever, lots of experience, give @POTUS a list of American Companies that can develop 350 million COVID19 test NEXT week, without any resources from China! Help America out sir! @NikkiHaley @CNN @IngrahamAngle 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
